comment: Derive the associative law for complex number multiplication ~ mulass interpreted as scalar multiplication to demonstrate the use of the properties of a normed subcomplex vector space for the complex numbers. (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
